                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> attachments)
        Sending emails with template body and dynamic values
        Parameters:
        from - From email address
        to - To email address
        subject - Subject of the email
        templatePath - Template path to be used as body
        keyValuePairs - Key value pairs to be used for dynamic content in the template
        attachments - Attachment file list to be attached to the email
        Returns:
        Log ID of the email log

        Returns:
